descriptor.name: HomeTriangle
descriptor.short_desc: HomeTriangle offers a wide range of home maintenance and repair services, providing expert solutions for cleaning, pest control, plumbing, electrical work, and more. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, HomeTriangle ensures your home gets the professional care it deserves.
descriptor.long_desc: HomeTriangle is a leading seller of home maintenance, repair, and improvement services, providing expert solutions across various categories such as cleaning, pest control, plumbing, electrical work, and appliance repair. With a strong commitment to quality, customer satisfaction, and professionalism, we ensure that all services are carried out by highly skilled professionals dedicated to meeting the unique needs of each home. From routine upkeep like deep cleaning and sanitization to specialized services such as water tank cleaning, chimney maintenance, and major appliance repairs, HomeTriangle offers reliable, efficient, and hassle-free solutions designed for convenience and peace of mind. Our customer-focused approach ensures that every job is handled with precision and care, making us the go-to seller for all your home service needs. Whether you're in need of urgent repairs or ongoing maintenance, HomeTriangle delivers exceptional service to keep your home functioning smoothly and safely.

descriptor.name: Cleaners United
descriptor.short_desc: We are Cleaners United,Housekeeping Firms in Bangalore. We are into service from almost 34 years having a very rich experience in this field. We know exactly what customer wants and how to cater to it. We are extremely happy to provide you exquisite services through Hometriangle.
descriptor.long_desc: We are Cleaners United,Housekeeping Firms in Bangalore. We are into service from almost 34 years having a very rich experience in this field. We know exactly what customer wants and how to cater to it. We are extremely happy to provide you exquisite services through Hometriangle.

descriptor.name: Unfurnished independent basic full house cleaning
descriptor.short_desc: This service package offers a sustainable approach to building your dream home with a material contract method.
descriptor.long_desc:
**General Areas (Living Room, Dining Room, Hallways)**
- Cleaning baseboards and door frames in detail
- Cleaning vents and light fixtures
- Washing windows (interior and exterior where accessible)
- Detailed cleaning of light switches and outlets

**Bedrooms**
- Cleaning baseboards and door frames in detail
- Cleaning vents and light fixtures
- Washing windows (interior and exterior where accessible)
- Detailed cleaning of light switches and outlets
- Exhaust fan cleaning

**Bathrooms**
- Scrubbing tile grout
- Cleaning under sinks and inside cabinets
- Washing windows (interior and exterior where accessible)
- Detailed cleaning of light switches and outlets

**Kitchen**
- Detailed cabinet cleaning (inside and outside)
- Washing windows (interior and exterior where accessible)
- Detailed cleaning of light switches and outlets
- Exhaust fan cleaning

**Excluded**
- Usage of scrubbing machine & wet-wiping of cabinet interiors
- Wet wiping of non-tiled walls & ceiling
- Shining of wooden floor & furniture
- Restoration, leakage fixes, painting or touch-ups
- Areas inaccessible to reach while cleaning

descriptor.name: Furnished apartment basic full house cleaning
descriptor.short_desc: This service package offers a sustainable approach to building your dream home with a material contract method.
descriptor.long_desc:
**Living Areas**
- Dusting all surfaces (furniture, shelves, decorative items)
- Vacuuming carpets and rugs
- Sweeping and mopping hard floors
- Cleaning windows (interior) and mirrors
- Emptying trash bins

**Bedrooms**
- Dusting all surfaces (furniture, shelves, decorative items)
- Making beds and changing linens (if provided)
- Vacuuming carpets and rugs
- Sweeping and mopping hard floors
- Cleaning windows (interior) and mirrors
- Emptying trash bins

**Bathrooms**
- Cleaning and disinfecting toilets, showers, bathtubs, and sinks
- Cleaning mirrors and glass surfaces
- Dusting all surfaces
- Sweeping and mopping floors
- Emptying trash bins
- Restocking toiletries (if provided)

**Kitchen**
- Cleaning and disinfecting countertops, sinks, and stovetops
- Wiping down cabinet exteriors and appliances
- Cleaning the exterior of the refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher
- Sweeping and mopping floors
- Emptying trash bins

**Excluded**
- Usage of scrubbing machine & cleaning of cabinet interiors
- Wet wiping of non-tiled walls & ceiling
- Shining of wooden floor & furniture
- Restoration, leakage fixes, painting or touch-ups
- Areas inaccessible to reach while cleaning

- Emptying trash bins
- Restocking toiletries (if provided)

**Kitchen**
- Cleaning and disinfecting countertops, sinks, and stovetops
- Wiping down cabinet exteriors and appliances
- Cleaning the exterior of the refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher
- Sweeping and mopping floors
- Emptying trash bins

**Excluded**
- Usage of scrubbing machine & cleaning of cabinet interiors
- Wet wiping of non-tiled walls & ceiling
- Shining of wooden floor & furniture
- Restoration, leakage fixes, painting or touch-ups
- Areas inaccessible to reach while cleaning
